name: Monuments Men
description:
During WWII the Nazis plundered Europe's greatest Art. 
After Hitler issued the Nero Decree, it was time to take it back!

Monuments Men

Set in the desperate late stages of WWII, Monuments Men is a unique turn based RPG inspired by events surrounding OSS Special Operations executive mission ' Ebensburg' activated after Hitler's issuance of The Nero Decree.

In Monuments Men, players take on the role of one of three OSS Specialists (Combat, Demolitions, or Reconnaissance) whose advance team has been assigned the mission of locating and protecting the Art and Antiquities plundered by the Nazis during the war.

Players are tasked with neutralizing enemy resistance, deactivating preplanned demolitions, and locating the art and antiquities, all while avoiding or detecting traps within an environment of ever increasing danger as they explore deeper within Austria's Altaussee Mine system. 

Features:
-Intuitive Point and Click Interface
-'Non Button Mashing'  Turn Based Game System
-Fully Animated 3D Graphics, Immersive Music, Sound, and Special Effects
-Multiple Mission Levels, Treasures, Traps, and Encounters with over a hundred locations
-Randomly generated object  locations and encounters for added replay value
-For Windows x64 (OSX Version available at the App Store, IOS Coming Soon)

Select an operative, enter Austria's  sprawling Altaussee Mine System, and begin the greatest and most dangerous treasure hunt in world history...  There's no telling what you might find!
